mapper.select: select a.id, a.staff_id, a.month, a.communication_allowance, a.other_allowance, a.birthday_card, a.cool_drink, a.condolence_goods, a.rent, a.phone_bill, a.remarks, s.staff_code, s.staff_name, s.dep_id, a.created_by, a.created_date, a.last_modified_by, a.last_modified_date from hr_allowance a left join hr_staff s on a.staff_id = s.id where a.id = #{allowanceId}

select a.id, a.staff_id, a.month, a.communication_allowance, a.other_allowance, a.birthday_card, a.cool_drink, a.condolence_goods, a.rent, a.phone_bill, a.remarks, s.staff_code, s.staff_name, s.dep_id, a.created_by, a.created_date, a.last_modified_by, a.last_modified_date from hr_allowance a left join hr_staff s on a.staff_id = s.id where s.staff_code = #{staffCode} and date_format(a.month, '%Y-%m') = #{month}
